channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Trump admin envoy says US won’t ‘conquer’ Greenland, emphasizes talks with locals as Denmark balks at move

item.title: The CDC’s Hepatitis B Vaccine Decision Is Wrongheaded and Illogical

item.title: Top 5 takeaways from latest Jeffrey Epstein files dump

item.title: Meet The Saint Who Shaped The Modern Nativity Scene
item.description: 'Then His mother took Him to her heart, and with her cheek and breast warmed Him with great joy, and a mother’s tender compassion.'

item.title: Why We Still Love the Yule Log
item.description: Sixty Christmases ago, the icon made its television debut — and it’s still a backdrop to our holidays.

item.title: American Jews, Chinese food and Christmas: The first connection was a 1935 gift of chow mein to a New Jersey orphanage
item.description: Elena Kagan was asked where she was on Christmas during her Supreme Court confirmation: “Like all Jews, I was probably at a Chinese restaurant.”

item.title: Why Bing Crosby’s ‘White Christmas’ Still Warms Our Hearts
